title: Global Marine Environmental Data - MARSPEC
description:
Global ocean bathymetry data
Geographic extent: Global
Year range: 1955-2010
Resolution: 5 arcmin (~10 km)
Data layers: Bathymetry
attribution: Sbrocco, E. J. and Barber, P. H. (2013) MARSPEC: Ocean climate layers for marine spatial ecology. Ecology 94:979. http://dx.doi.org/10.1890/12-1358.1
external_description: MARSPEC provides a range of geophysical raster grids for the world ocean. Currently, BCCVL only provides the bathymetry layer of this dataset collection. Other marine environmental layers can be found in the Bio-Oracle dataset collection.Website: http://marspec.weebly.com/
